AppName.markdownDescription:
The name of the app.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 63  
Pattern: ^[a-zA-Z0-9](-*[a-zA-Z0-9]){0,62}  
Update requires: Replacement

AppType.markdownDescription:
The type of app.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: JupyterServer | KernelGateway | RStudioServerPro | RSessionGateway | Canvas  
Update requires: Replacement

DomainId.markdownDescription:
The domain ID.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 63  
Update requires: Replacement

ResourceSpec.description: The instance type and the Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the SageMaker image created on the instance.
ResourceSpec.markdownDescription:
The instance type and the Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the SageMaker image created on the instance.

---

Required: No  
Type:   
Update requires: Replacement

Tags.description: A list of tags to apply to the app.
Tags.markdownDescription:
A list of tags to apply to the app.

---

Required: No  
Type: Array  
Update requires: Replacement

UserProfileName.markdownDescription:
The user profile name.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 63  
Pattern: ^[a-zA-Z0-9](-*[a-zA-Z0-9]){0,62}  
Update requires: Replacement

InstanceType.description: The instance type that the image version runs on.
InstanceType.markdownDescription:
The instance type that the image version runs on.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: system | ml.t3.micro | ml.t3.small | ml.t3.medium | ml.t3.large | ml.t3.xlarge | ml.t3.2xlarge | ml.m5.large | ml.m5.xlarge | ml.m5.2xlarge | ml.m5.4xlarge | ml.m5.8xlarge | ml.m5.12xlarge | ml.m5.16xlarge | ml.m5.24xlarge | ml.c5.large | ml.c5.xlarge | ml.c5.2xlarge | ml.c5.4xlarge | ml.c5.9xlarge | ml.c5.12xlarge | ml.c5.18xlarge | ml.c5.24xlarge | ml.p3.2xlarge | ml.p3.8xlarge | ml.p3.16xlarge | ml.g4dn.xlarge | ml.g4dn.2xlarge | ml.g4dn.4xlarge | ml.g4dn.8xlarge | ml.g4dn.12xlarge | ml.g4dn.16xlarge | ml.r5.large | ml.r5.xlarge | ml.r5.2xlarge | ml.r5.4xlarge | ml.r5.8xlarge | ml.r5.12xlarge | ml.r5.16xlarge | ml.r5.24xlarge | ml.p3dn.24xlarge | ml.m5d.large | ml.m5d.xlarge | ml.m5d.2xlarge | ml.m5d.4xlarge | ml.m5d.8xlarge | ml.m5d.12xlarge | ml.m5d.16xlarge | ml.m5d.24xlarge | ml.g5.xlarge | ml.g5.2xlarge | ml.g5.4xlarge | ml.g5.8xlarge | ml.g5.12xlarge | ml.g5.16xlarge | ml.g5.24xlarge | ml.g5.48xlarge | ml.p4d.24xlarge | ml.p4de.24xlarge | ml.geospatial.interactive  
Update requires: No interruption

SageMakerImageArn.description: The ARN of the SageMaker image that the image version belongs to.
SageMakerImageArn.markdownDescription:
The ARN of the SageMaker image that the image version belongs to.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 256  
Pattern: ^arn:aws(-[\w]+)*:sagemaker:.+:[0-9]{12}:image/[a-z0-9]([-.]?[a-z0-9])*$  
Update requires: No interruption

SageMakerImageVersionArn.description: The ARN of the image version created on the instance.
SageMakerImageVersionArn.markdownDescription:
The ARN of the image version created on the instance.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 256  
Pattern: ^arn:aws(-[\w]+)*:sagemaker:.+:[0-9]{12}:image-version/[a-z0-9]([-.]?[a-z0-9])*/[0-9]+$  
Update requires: No interruption

AppArn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the app.
AppArn.markdownDescription:
The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the app.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 256  
Pattern: arn:aws[a-z\-]*:sagemaker:[a-z0-9\-]*:[0-9]{12}:app/.*  
Update requires: No interruption
